description.content: POST a new entity to be owned by the authenticated user and / or the default SIS user of the institution
DELETE a single entity by identifier
PUT a new version of an entity
## You might see this screen because the badge you are looking for is *set to private*. ## Ask the recipient to set the badge to public, then try again.
GET a single entity by its identifier
Edubadges are digital certificates which show that the owner has acquired certain skills or knowledge
